alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 2:10PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 300 PM MST... At 210 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boyce Thompson Arboretum, or 7 miles west of Superior, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Superior, Queen Valley, Boyce Thompson Arboretum and Top-Of-The-World. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 216 and 242. AZ Route 177 between mile markers 161 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior
